languages.text: "Под слоем кремния и гранита покоятся знания и возможности, которые способны давать отпор врагам Человечества. Мы слишком сильно боимся того, на чем стоит ярлык запретного. В моей памяти тысячи... тысячи тысяч страниц манускриптов, томов и свитков, за прикосновение к которым проповедники прочат мгновенную погибель. Но это ложь. И я тому — прямое доказательство".

"Buried under silica and granite are knowledge and resources that could repel the enemies of Humanity. We are too afraid of anything labelled 'prohibited.' My memory contains thousands... thousands upon thousands of pages from manuscripts, tomes, and scrolls — contact with any one of these is supposed to guarantee instant death. But the preachers who claim this are liars. I am living proof of their falsehoods."
languages.original_text: "Под слоем кремния и гранита покоятся знания и возможности, которые способны давать отпор врагам Человечества. Мы слишком сильно боимся того, на чем стоит ярлык запретного. В моей памяти тысячи... тысячи тысяч страниц манускриптов, томов и свитков, за прикосновение к которым проповедники прочат мгновенную погибель. Но это ложь. И я тому — прямое доказательство".

My memory contains thousands... thousands upon thousands of pages from manuscripts, tomes, and scrolls — contact with any one of these is supposed to guarantee instant death. But the preachers who claim this are liars. I am living proof of their falsehoods."

"Buried under silica and granite are knowledge and resources that could repel the enemies of Humanity. We are too afraid of anything labelled 'prohibited.' My memory contains thousands... thousands upon thousands of pages from manuscripts, tomes, and scrolls — contact with any one of these is supposed to guarantee instant death. But the preachers who claim this are liars. I am living proof of their falsehoods."

"Buried under silica and granite are knowledge and resources that could repel the enemies of Humanity. We are too afraid of anything labelled 'prohibited.' My memory contains thousands... thousands upon thousands of pages from manuscripts, tomes, and scrolls — contact with any one of these is supposed to guarantee instant death. But the preachers who claim this are liars. I am living proof of their falsehoods."

"Buried under silica and granite are knowledge and resources that could repel the enemies of Humanity. We are too afraid of anything labelled 'prohibited.' My memory contains thousands... thousands upon thousands of pages from manuscripts, tomes, and scrolls — contact with any one of these is supposed to guarantee instant death. But the preachers who claim this are liars. I am living proof of their falsehoods."

languages.text: “那些埋藏在硅石与花岗岩下面的知识与资源，可以用来击退人类之敌。我们过于惧怕那些被贴上‘违禁’标签的东西。我的记忆中有成千上万……数不胜数的手稿、典籍与卷轴。那些布道士说，只要接触到这些内容，就会立刻丧命。可他们都是骗子，我还活着，这就是活生生的证据。”
languages.original_text: "Buried under silica and granite are knowledge and resources that could repel the enemies of Humanity. We are too afraid of anything labelled 'prohibited.' My memory contains thousands... thousands upon thousands of pages from manuscripts, tomes, and scrolls — contact with any one of these is supposed to guarantee instant death. But the preachers who claim this are liars. I am living proof of their falsehoods."

traits.locale_text: “那些埋藏在硅石与花岗岩下面的知识与资源，可以用来击退人类之敌。我们过于惧怕那些被贴上‘违禁’标签的东西。我的记忆中有成千上万……数不胜数的手稿、典籍与卷轴。那些布道士说，只要接触到这些内容，就会立刻丧命。可他们都是骗子，我还活着，这就是活生生的证据。”

languages.text: «Debajo del sílice y el granito hay conocimiento y recursos que podría ayudarnos a rechazar a los enemigos de la Humanidad. Tenemos demasiado miedo de todo lo "prohibido". Mi memoria contiene miles... miles y miles de páginas de manuscritos, volúmenes y pergaminos cuyo contenido, en teoría, causa una muerte inmediata. Quienes promulgan esas ideas mienten. Yo soy prueba viviente de ello».
languages.original_text: "Buried under silica and granite are knowledge and resources that could repel the enemies of Humanity. We are too afraid of anything labelled 'prohibited.' My memory contains thousands... thousands upon thousands of pages from manuscripts, tomes, and scrolls — contact with any one of these is supposed to guarantee instant death. But the preachers who claim this are liars. I am living proof of their falsehoods."

traits.locale_text: «Debajo del sílice y el granito hay conocimiento y recursos que podría ayudarnos a rechazar a los enemigos de la Humanidad. Tenemos demasiado miedo de todo lo "prohibido". Mi memoria contiene miles... miles y miles de páginas de manuscritos, volúmenes y pergaminos cuyo contenido, en teoría, causa una muerte inmediata. Quienes promulgan esas ideas mienten. Yo soy prueba viviente de ello».

languages.text: 「シリカや花崗岩の下には、人類の敵を撃退できる知識や資源が埋もれています。私たちは『禁止』とラベル付けされたものを恐れすぎているのです。私の記憶には、何百…何千ページもの写本、本、巻物が含まれていおり、これらのいずれかに接触すると即死すると言われています。しかし、これを主張するプリーチャーは嘘つきです。私は彼らの嘘の生き証人なのです」
languages.original_text: "Buried under silica and granite are knowledge and resources that could repel the enemies of Humanity. We are too afraid of anything labelled 'prohibited.' My memory contains thousands... thousands upon thousands of pages from manuscripts, tomes, and scrolls — contact with any one of these is supposed to guarantee instant death. But the preachers who claim this are liars. I am living proof of their falsehoods."

traits.locale_text: 「シリカや花崗岩の下には、人類の敵を撃退できる知識や資源が埋もれています。私たちは『禁止』とラベル付けされたものを恐れすぎているのです。私の記憶には、何百…何千ページもの写本、本、巻物が含まれていおり、これらのいずれかに接触すると即死すると言われています。しかし、これを主張するプリーチャーは嘘つきです。私は彼らの嘘の生き証人なのです」

languages.text: « Sous la silice et le granit sont enfouies des connaissances et des ressources capables de repousser les ennemis de l'humanité. Nous avons trop peur de tout ce qui est considéré comme "interdit". Ma mémoire contient des milliers de pages de manuscrits, de livres et de parchemins qui sont censés tuer sur-le-champ quiconque les touche, mais les prêcheurs qui affirment cela sont des menteurs. Je suis la preuve vivante de leur imposture. »
languages.original_text: "Buried under silica and granite are knowledge and resources that could repel the enemies of Humanity. We are too afraid of anything labelled 'prohibited.' My memory contains thousands... thousands upon thousands of pages from manuscripts, tomes, and scrolls — contact with any one of these is supposed to guarantee instant death. But the preachers who claim this are liars. I am living proof of their falsehoods."

traits.locale_text: « Sous la silice et le granit sont enfouies des connaissances et des ressources capables de repousser les ennemis de l'humanité. Nous avons trop peur de tout ce qui est considéré comme "interdit". Ma mémoire contient des milliers de pages de manuscrits, de livres et de parchemins qui sont censés tuer sur-le-champ quiconque les touche, mais les prédicateurs qui affirment cela sont des menteurs. Je suis la preuve vivante de leur imposture. »

languages.text: "Vergraben unter Quarz und Granit liegen Wissen und Ressourcen, die die Feinde der Menschheit vertreiben könnten. Wir haben nur zu viel Angst vor allem, was 'verboten' ist. Mein Gedächtnis enthält Tausende ... Tausende und Abertausende von Seiten aus Manuskripten, Folianten und Schriftrollen – und der Kontakt mit jeder einzelnen davon bringt angeblich garantiert den sofortigen Tod. Aber die Prediger, die das behaupten, sind Lügner. Ich bin der lebende Beweis für ihre Falschaussagen."
languages.original_text: "Buried under silica and granite are knowledge and resources that could repel the enemies of Humanity. We are too afraid of anything labelled 'prohibited.' My memory contains thousands... thousands upon thousands of pages from manuscripts, tomes, and scrolls — contact with any one of these is supposed to guarantee instant death. But the preachers who claim this are liars. I am living proof of their falsehoods."

traits.locale_text: "Vergraben unter Quarz und Granit liegen Wissen und Ressourcen, die die Feinde der Menschheit vertreiben könnten. Wir haben nur zu viel Angst vor allem, was 'verboten' ist. Mein Gedächtnis enthält Tausende ... Tausende und Abertausende von Seiten aus Manuskripten, Folianten und Schriftrollen – und der Kontakt mit jeder einzelnen davon bringt angeblich garantiert den sofortigen Tod. Aber die Prediger, die das behaupten, sind Lügner. Ich bin der lebende Beweis für ihre Falschaussagen."

languages.text: "Silis ve granitin altında, İnsanlığın düşmanlarını püskürtebilecek bilgiler ve kaynaklar yatıyor. 'Yasaklı' olarak damgalanmış şeylerden fazlasıyla korkuyoruz. Hafızamda bunlardan biriyle temas etmenin kesin bir şekilde anında ölümle sonuçlanacağını söyleyen binlerce, binlerce çarpı binlerce sayfa yazma, kitap cildi ve tomar bulunuyor. Ancak bu iddiada bulunan vaizler yalan söylüyor. Ben yanıldıklarının canlı kanıtıyım."
languages.original_text: "Buried under silica and granite are knowledge and resources that could repel the enemies of Humanity. We are too afraid of anything labelled 'prohibited.' My memory contains thousands... thousands upon thousands of pages from manuscripts, tomes, and scrolls — contact with any one of these is supposed to guarantee instant death. But the preachers who claim this are liars. I am living proof of their falsehoods."

traits.locale_text: "Silikanın ve granitin altında, İnsanlığın düşmanlarını püskürtebilecek bilgiler ve kaynaklar bulunuyor. 'Yasaklı' olarak damgalanmış her şeyden fazlasıyla korkuyoruz. Hafızamda bunlardan biriyle temas etmenin kesin bir şekilde anında ölümle sonuçlanacağını söyleyen binlerce, binlerce çarpı binlerce sayfa yazma, kitap cildi ve tomar bulunuyor. Ancak bu iddiada bulunan vaizler yalan söylüyor. Ben yanıldıklarının canlı kanıtıyım."
